title:
Comparison of a pseudoscalar meson form factor in QCD with 3, 4, and 5
  colors
abstract:
I show comparisons of the pseudoscalar meson vector form factor from
simulations of QCD with $N_c = 3$, 4 and 5 colors and $N_f = 2$ flavors of
degenerate mass fermions at a common (matched) fermion mass, lattice spacing,
and simulation volume. The dependence of the form factor on the momentum
transfer is nearly independent of the number of colors, and is consistent with
the expectations of vector meson dominance.
